name: AugurkCLI
description: Runs the various commands supported by the Augurk CLI.
author: Augurk

inputs.name: augurkInstance
inputs.label: Augurk Instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Augurk instance to which the results should be uploaded.

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the command to run using the Augurk CLI

inputs.name: productName
inputs.label: Product Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the product to operate on in Augurk.

inputs.name: useFolderStructure
inputs.label: Use folder structure
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether the folder structure in which the feature files are placed is used to create groups within Augurk. If this option is checked, the name of the parent folders of each feature file is used as a group name. Otherwise set the group name explicitly above.

inputs.name: groupName
inputs.label: Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the group to operate on in Augurk. NOTE: For the publish command this is required, for the other commands it is optional.

inputs.name: features
inputs.label: Feature(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root of the feature file(s) to publish. Wildcards can be used. For example, `**/*.feature` for all feature files in all sub folders.

inputs.name: language
inputs.label: Language
inputs.helpMarkDown: Language in which the feature files have been written. For example: `en-US` or `nl-NL`.

inputs.name: embedImages
inputs.label: Embed images
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable this option if you want images referenced in feature files to be embedded so they can be viewed in Augurk.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the feature files being published. Supports variables (in the format $(<variable-name>).

inputs.name: includeProductDescription
inputs.label: Include product description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether a product description file will be uploaded to Augurk

inputs.name: productDescription
inputs.label: Product description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a Markdown file containing a description of the product being published to Augurk.

inputs.name: featureName
inputs.label: Feature name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the feature to delete, or empty to delete all features in the selected product and group.

inputs.name: prereleaseOnly
inputs.label: Prune prerelease versions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates that prerelease versions of features in the configured product and group should be pruned.

inputs.name: versionRegex
inputs.label: Version regular expression
inputs.helpMarkDown: A regular expression used to match versions that should be pruned.

inputs.name: additionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional argument(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any additional command line arguments you want to pass to the Augurk CLI
